h-card parsing tests ‐ change logs

The files in this directory where designed to test the parsing of includes.

Change log:

  • Update text output to be textContent non-trimmed ‐ 29 May 2015 by Glenn Jones
  • Converted all the classes over to microformats v1 ‐ 23 May 2015 by Glenn Jones
  • Broke old HTML format into small files to aid simpler testing ‐ 21 May 2015 by Glenn Jones
  • Updated JSON examples so it always has the rel={} object as well as the items=[] array ‐ 21 November 2013 by Glenn Jones
  • Updated encoding issue on p-* ‐ 19 September 2013 by Glenn Jones
  • Created ‐ 11 January 2013 by Glenn Jones

Contributors:
